comment.body: https://spyware.neocities.org/articles/brave.html As for me personally i'm too paranoid to use brave, however i've found on a linux system you can find a browsers directory in, for example in opt, and run a vmtouch -dl /opt/$BROWSER to keep it cached in ram at all times. This only takes 100-200M of ram, but if you have the memory to spare, it'll load up near instantly.
fucking cute. too bad about that plant weed and toxicity stuff though
nice. how does it work for you?
@Styromaniac: sounds pretty good. I'll use it if my built in adapter shits out, as they seem prone
